item.title: Reel
item.description: .aspect-ratio { position: relative; width: 100%; height: 0; padding-bottom: 75%; } .aspect-ratio iframe { position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0; top: 0; } DI TD&FX 2023 SHOWREEL .aspect-ratio { position: relative; width: 100%; height: 0; padding-bottom: 75%; } .aspect-ratio iframe { position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0; top: 0; } DI Colorist Reel 2020 - TRUTHLESS .

item.title: Film
item.description: 2023 .container { display: flex; align-items: flex-end; } .text { margin-left: 20px; } h1 { font-size: 18px; margin: 0; } h2 { font-size: 18px; margin-bottom: 5px; } h3 { font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 5px; } img { max-width: 20%; height: auto; margin-bottom: 30px; } a { text-decoration: none; } :root { --filtered-color: rgb(110, 20, 30); } .image-container { flex-wrap: wrap; } .image-container img { max-height: 20px; width: auto; object-fit: cover; flex: 1; } 流浪地球2 (2023) The Wandering Earth Ⅱ @流程研发 Pipeline TD / Digital Intermediate Engineer .

item.title: Contact
item.description: Mail me : juneleungchan@163.com Github: https://github.com/juneleung CMDB: 陈俊良

item.title: Red Rose
item.description: A rose is either a woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae, or the flower it bears. There are over three hundred species and tens of thousands of cultivars.They form a group of plants that can be erect shrubs, climbing, or trailing, with stems that are often armed with sharp prickles. Their flowers vary in size and shape and are usually large and showy, in colours ranging from white through yellows and reds.

item.title: Red Rose
item.description: A rose is either a woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae, or the flower it bears. There are over three hundred species and tens of thousands of cultivars.They form a group of plants that can be erect shrubs, climbing, or trailing, with stems that are often armed with sharp prickles. Their flowers vary in size and shape and are usually large and showy, in colours ranging from white through yellows and reds.
